Serialized Form

  • Package mgci.jhdap.shogi

    • Class mgci.jhdap.shogi.BoardPanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • backgroundColor

          java.awt.Color backgroundColor
          The default background color for the entire panel.

        • boardOffset

          java.awt.Point boardOffset
          The x,y coordinates of the top left corner of the shogi board.

        • dropTableOffset1

          java.awt.Point dropTableOffset1
          The x,y coordinates of the top left corner of the bottom drop table.

        • dropTableOffset2

          java.awt.Point dropTableOffset2
          The x,y coordinates of the top left corner of the top drop table.

        • pieceOffset

          java.awt.Point pieceOffset
          The offset for drawing a piece in x,y coordinates relative to the top left corner of a tile. This is to ensure that the piece is always drawn at the center of a shogi board tile.

        • dropTableSize

          java.awt.Dimension dropTableSize
          The width,height dimensions of a drop table.

        • pieceSize

          java.awt.Dimension pieceSize
          The width,height dimensions of a shogi piece.

        • tileSize

          java.awt.Dimension tileSize
          The width,height dimensions of a shogi board tile.

        • click

          java.awt.Point[] click
          The location of the cursor when the corresponding mouse button was pressed.

        • mouse

          java.awt.Point mouse
          The current location of the cursor.

        • mousePressed

          boolean[] mousePressed
          Whether the mouse button is currently being pressed or not.

        • proMode

          boolean proMode
          If true, pro_mode mode is active. If active, all of the possible moves of a piece are not displayed when the piece is selected, and a player receives an instant loss if an invalid move is attempted.

        • showBoardLabels

          boolean showBoardLabels
          If true, this panel draws the board coordinate labels (e.g. 1a, 2a, 2b).

        • showLastMove

          boolean showLastMove
          If true, the previous move is indicated.

        • log

          boolean log
          If true, the console (if open) logs every single little action

        • takeTurns

          boolean takeTurns
          If true, the players take turns.

        • pieceIsSelected

          boolean pieceIsSelected
          If true, the cursor is currently holding a piece.

        • selectedPiece

          Piece selectedPiece
          The selected piece.

        • lastMoved

          Tile lastMoved
          The location of the last move.

        • turn

          int turn
          The current player.

        • winner

          int winner
          The winner of the game. 1 indicates the bottom player as winner. -1 indicates top player as winner. 0 indicates no winner;

        • texturePath

          java.lang.String texturePath
          The name of the folder of the active texture pack. All texture packs are accessed from the texturepacks/ folder.

        • snap

          SoundEffect snap
          The sound that plays whenever a piece is moved or promoted.

        • gui

          GraphicUI gui
          The parent GraphicUI object.

        • c

          ShogiConsole c
          The debug console.

        • s

          StatsPanel s
          The statistics panel.

        • state

          GameState state
          The GameState object representing the shogi board.

    • Class mgci.jhdap.shogi.CommandLineInterface extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • bgColor

          java.awt.Color bgColor
          The default background color.

        • fgColor

          java.awt.Color fgColor
          The default text color.

        • font

          java.awt.Font font
          The default font.

        • txt

          javax.swing.JTextPane txt
          The large JTextPane for displaying all messages.

        • _input

          javax.swing.JTextField _input
          The JTextField for input.

        • keyWord

          javax.swing.text.SimpleAttributeSet keyWord
          The SimpleAttributeSet for determining the style of the text in the txt JTextPane.

        • commands

          java.util.List<E> commands
          The list of commands in the form of Command objects. Each instance has an execute method that corresponds with its regex and detail String fields. Override the initCommands() method to add custom commands.

    • Class mgci.jhdap.shogi.GraphicUI extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • board

          BoardPanel board
          The component representing the shogi board.

        • stats

          StatsPanel stats
          The component representing the statistics panel.

        • consoleIsOpen

          boolean consoleIsOpen
          If true, the debug console is open. This variable is to prevent null pointer exceptions.

    • Class mgci.jhdap.shogi.ShogiConsole extends CommandLineInterface implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • gui

          GraphicUI gui
          The GraphicUI object to which this console is connected.

        • notation

          int notation
          The current notation format that the console uses for outputting coordinates.
          • 0 = the GameState x,y coordinates.
          • 1 = the standard shogi file,rank coordinates.

    • Class mgci.jhdap.shogi.StatsPanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • player1

          PlayerPane player1
          The player pane for player1 (the bottom player).

        • player2

          PlayerPane player2
          The player pane for player2 (the top player)

        • historyText

          javax.swing.JTextArea historyText
          The JTextArea containing the move history.

        • history

          javax.swing.JScrollPane history
          The JScrollPane containing the move history text pane.

        • turn

          int turn
          Whose turn it is: 1 = player 1 ; -1 = player 2.

        • thread

          java.lang.Thread thread
          The thread that runs the timers.

        • pauseButton

          javax.swing.JButton pauseButton
          The pause button. It has to be out here as a field variable because its text changes.

        • timing

          boolean timing
          If false, then the current player's timer is paused.

        • gui

          GraphicUI gui
          The parent GraphicUI object.

    • Class mgci.jhdap.shogi.Tile extends java.awt.Point implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • f

          int f
          The file or column of the square.

        • r

          char r
          The rank or row of the square.
